Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Purified Monolith at the target position. The Purified Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Purification Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Adept, War Adept and War Macine

<Purified Psionic>can also increase the attack damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Purified Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Purification Monolith: Lv1

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Void Monolith at the target position. The Void Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Void Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Dark Templar, Twilight Templar and Void Colossus

<Void Psionic>can also reduce the cooldown of all Karass' combat units' abilities

You can have at most 3 Void Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Void Monolith: Lv1

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Khala Monolith at the target position. The Khala Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Khala Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Zealots, Dark Zealots and Psionic Sentry

<Khala Psionic>can also increase the maximum shield points of Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Khala Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Khala Monolith: Lv1

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy an Order Monolith at the target position. The Order Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Order Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of High Templar, Light Archon and Tempest of Declaration

<Order Psionic>can also increase the spell damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Order Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Order Monolith: Lv1

Root.Tooltip: The guardians of Sea of World - Psionic Sentry, War Machine, Void Monolith, and Tempest of Declaration - will consume souls stored in Sea of World, cost 3 points of energy by every 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Sea of the Lost World

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Purified Monolith at the target position. The Purified Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Purified Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Adept, War Adept and War Macine

<Purified Psionic>can also increase the attack damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Purified Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Purification Monolith: Lv2

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Purified Monolith at the target position. The Purified Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Purified Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Adept, War Adept and War Macine

<Purified Psionic>can also increase the attack damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Purified Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Purification Monolith: Lv3

Root.Tooltip: Withdraw this guardian from the battlefield and stop energy consumption.
Root.Name: Cancel Warp-in

Root.Tooltip:
Warp in War Machine the Guardian at the target position.

War Machine was once the Protoss Dragoon Taldarin's body. After Taldarin returned to Sea of the Lost World, his body was improved and he became one of the guardians of Sea of the Lost World.

War Machine is infused with golden < Purification Psionic >, according to the level of Purification Psionic, War Machine will acquire following abilities:
Lv1 - Harden Shield: War Machine will not take too much damage.
Lv2 - Space Fragment: War Machine's attack on heavy armor units will cause wide range damage and stun effect.
Lv3 - War Overload: War Machine will gradually increase the attack speed when attacking.

War Machine will continuously fight on the battlefield until being deactivated or the energy of Sea of the Lost World depleted. War Machine will cost 3 points of energy by every 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Warp War Machine

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Void Monolith at the target position. The Void Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Void Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Dark Templar, Twilight Templar and Void Colossus

<Void Psionic>can also reduce the cooldown of all Karass' combat units' abilities

You can have at most 3 Void Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Void Monolith: Lv2

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Void Monolith at the target position. The Void Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Void Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Dark Templar, Twilight Templar and Void Colossus

<Void Psionic>can also reduce the cooldown of all Karass' combat units' abilities

You can have at most 3 Void Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Void Monolith: Lv3

Root.Tooltip: Withdraw this guardian from the battlefield and stop energy consumption.
Root.Name: Cancel Warp-in

Root.Tooltip:
Warp in Void Colossus the Gardian at the target position.

Void Colossus was once a guardian of a Xel'Naga temple called Talim, he accidentally merged with the void energy and became one of the guardians of Sea of the Lost World.

Void Colossus is infused with green < Void Psionic>, according to the level of Void Psionic, Void Colossus will acquire following abilities:
Lv1 - Time Collapse: enhance the time slowing effect of the weapon of Void Colossus, Time-Space Eye Beam.
Lv2 - Void Flame: Void Colossus will burn enemy units in a wide range and make them lost field of vision.
Lv3 - Vengeful Spirit: Units killed by the Void Colossus will turn into Vengeful Souls and get feard and counterattack their former allies.

Void Colossus will continuously fight on the battlefield until being deactivated or the energy of Sea of the Lost World depleted. Void Colossus will cost 3 points of energy by every 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Warp Void Colossus

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Khala Monolith at the target position. The Khala Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Khala Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Zealots, Dark Zealots and Psionic Sentry

<Khala Psionic>can also increase the maximum shield points of Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Khala Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Khala Monolith: Lv2

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy a Khala Monolith at the target position. The Khala Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Khala Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of Zealots, Dark Zealots and Psionic Sentry

<Khala Psionic>can also increase the maximum shield points of Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Khala Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Khala Monolith: Lv3

Root.Tooltip: Withdraw this guardian from the battlefield and stop energy consumption.
Root.Name: Cancel Warp-in

Root.Tooltip:
Warp in Psionic Sentry at the target position.

The pilots of Psionic Sentry are Orlana and Shantira, grand preservers of the Protoss Empire. After being murdered by the swarm, their souls become guardians of Sea of World.

Psionic Sentry has indoctrinated blue<Khala Psionic>, and according to the level of Khala Psionic, Psionic Sentry will acquire following abilities:
Lv1 - Shield filling: Psionic Sentry can emit shield filling beams to charge ally's unit's shield.
Lv2 - Guardian Shield: Reduce nearby ally's unit damage taken and increase their attack speed.
Lv3 - Astral Wind: Providing Ally's unit shield and health regeneration.

Psionic Sentry will continuously fight on the battlefield until being deactivated or the energy of Sea of World depleted. Psionic Sentry will cost 3 points of energy by every 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Warp Psionic Sentry

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy an Order Monolith at the target position. The Order Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Order Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of High Templar, Light Archon and Tempest of Declaration

<Order Psionic>can also increase the spell damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Order Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Order Monolith: Lv2

Root.Tooltip:
Deploy an Order Monolith at the target position. The Order Monolith can provide advanced energy field and upgrade the <Order Psionic>which will improve the psionic power of High Templar, Light Archon and Tempest of Declaration

<Order Psionic>can also increase the spell damage of all Karass' combat units

You can have at most 3 Order Monolith.
Root.Name: Warp Order Monolith: Lv3

Root.Tooltip: Withdraw this guardian from the battlefield and stop energy consumption.
Root.Name: Cancel Warp-in

Root.Tooltip:
Warp in Tempest of Declaration at the target position.

The pilot of Tempest of Declaration is Savassan, or more fimilarized known as Khas, the founder of Khala. Savassan is the first protoss who came to Sea of World and become one of the guardians of Sea of World.

Tempest of Declaration has indoctrinated white<Order Psionic>, and according to the level of Order Psionic, Tempest of Declaration will acquire following abilities:
Lv1 - Kinetic Resonance: Increase the reloading speed and attack speed of Tempest of Declaration.
Lv2 - Energy Storm: Enemy unit killed by Tempest of Declaration will create energy storm and deal continuous damage.
Lv3 - Storm Annihilation: Lauch a gigantic annihilation kinetic shot to destroy target area.

Tempest of Declaration will continuously fight on the battlefield until being deactivated or the energy of Sea of World depleted. Tempest of Declaration will cost 3 points of energy by every 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Warp in Tempest of Declaration

Root.Tooltip: Karass' Sea of World units will grant the lost altar some energy when they die. Reforged units will grant more energy.
Root.Name: Spirit of the Lost World

Root.Tooltip: Tempest of Declaration launches Storm Annihilation and deals 300 (vs. Structure 550) area damage.
Root.Name: Storm Annihilation
